column4: I have a question.  When I take a photo/ video, on my iphone, and the pictures are uploaded to Photo cloud in Ubuntu one.  However, when I try to put a photo on ebay, it flips it for some reason.  Also when I view my video on my system, it is upside down.  Any fixes?
did you try using Gimp to flip the images?
I use shotwell.  I will try gimp
try to avoid the @name thing, if you use "name:" it appears as a different color on my screen
